title: Pizza Hut is rolling out a massive, cheese-filled 'Stuffed Cheez-It Pizza'
text:
Pizza Hut and Cheez-It are teaming up to create massive, cheese-filled squares of carbs.

On Tuesday, Pizza Hut debuted the Stuffed Cheez-It Pizza. The "pizza" is made up of four jumbo squares with a crust-like outer layer, filled with Cheez-It sharp cheddar.

Read more: Pizza Hut is rebooting its iconic 'red roof' logo with a retro design

Customers can order cheese or pepperoni and cheese options, which are served with a side of marinara dipping sauce.

Pizza Hut

Stuffed Cheez-It Pizza hits menus on Tuesday at the price of $6.49. On September 24, the new menu item will be added to Pizza Hut's value menu, the $5 N' Up Lineup, priced at $6 if you buy two or more items from the menu.

"We pride ourselves on being the go-to for unexpected pizza innovations, and I can't think of a more bada-- partner than Cheez-It to bring our next original menu item to life," Marianne Radley, Pizza Hut's chief brand officer, said in a statement.

Pizza Hut has been making tweaks to win back customers throughout 2019, including updating the recipe for its Original Pan Pizza and bringing back its retro logo.
description: Pizza Hut and Cheez-It are teaming up to create massive, cheese-filled squares of carbs called the Stuffed Cheez-It Pizza.
